anya-e0905n0:226_1: tasmiṃ bhante catutthapārājike asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:226_3: yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahāti bhaṇati paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa,
anya-e0905n0:226_5: uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhante ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:228_1: channaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anāpatti adhimānena bhaṇantassa anullapanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n0:229_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:231_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:232_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:233_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:235_0: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:237_0: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:238_1: channaṃ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n0:239_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:241_0: Pucchā – sattannaṃ āvuso samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:242_1: sattannaṃ bhante samathānaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati,
anya-e0905n0:243_0: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:244_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:245_0: Pucchā – kiṃ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:246_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:252_1: na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:253_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:254_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:262_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:264_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:267_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n0:271_1: yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:274_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante seyyasakaṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:276_1: āyasmā bhante seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi,
anya-e0905n0:277_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:278_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:280_0: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi saṅghādisesoti ayaṃ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:282_0: Vissajjanā – aññatra supinantāti ayaṃ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:284_1: sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatrasupinantā saṅghādisoti ayaṃ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:285_0: Pucchā – sādhāraṇa paññattinukho āvuso asādhāraṇa paññattinukho.
anya-e0905n0:287_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:288_1: upakkamitvā bhante asuciṃ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:289_0: Saṅghādisesassa, ceteti upakkamati na muccati āpatti thullaccayassa, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:291_1: channaṃ bhante anāpatti supinantena mocentassa na mocanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa
anya-e0905n0:291_2: ādikammikassa imesaṃ kho bhante channaṃ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n0:292_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṃ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:293_0: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṃ bhante pātimokkhuddesānaṃ tatiyena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:294_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:301_1: na eva rūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṃ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:302_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:303_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto saṅghasuṭṭhutāya…pe…
anya-e0905n0:307_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:309_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:312_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha sanidāne sapadabhājanīye savinītavatthuke upanetabbaṃ vā apanetabbaṃ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṃ vā.
anya-e0905n0:314_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ paṭhamassa saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadassa nidānampi pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n0:314_8: puṭṭho puṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n0:314_9: itihidaṃ bhante paṭhama saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṃ saparivāraṃ nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:314_10: Tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n0:314_11: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:314_12: evameva mayampi sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā idaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0905n0:314_13: nidānato paṭṭhāya ekaccānaṃ vacasā sajjhāyavasena ekaccānaṃ manasā manasikaraṇavasenaca ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0905n0:315_2: sammāsambuddhena mātukāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassa ca,
anya-e0905n0:315_4: mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa ca,
anya-e0905n0:315_5: sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:318_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante udāyittheraṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:320_1: āyasmā bhante udāyitthero mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n0:320_2: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi,
anya-e0905n0:320_3: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0905n0:322_2: sammāsambuddhena saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:325_0: Vissajjanā – āḷavike bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:327_0: Vissajjanā – āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:329_2: sammāsambuddhena mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:332_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante channattheraṃ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:334_1: āyasmā bhante channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagara pūjitaṃ janapadapūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:336_2: sammāsambuddhena bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa ca,
anya-e0905n0:336_3: bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:338_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:339_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:339_3: teyeva bhante mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ
anya-e0905n0:341_2: sammāsambuddhena saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:343_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattho.
anya-e0905n0:345_0: Devadatto bhante samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:347_2: sammāsambuddhena bhedānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantānaṃ saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:349_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:350_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghābhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṃ vaggavādakā,
anya-e0905n0:352_2: sammāsambuddhena dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:354_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:355_2: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n0:357_2: sammāsambuddhena kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:359_0: Pucchā – kaṃ ārabbha āvuso kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:360_1: assaji punabbasuke bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:360_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:362_2: sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo ca aniyato dutiyo ca aniyato kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:364_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:365_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekoekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n0:365_4: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n0:367_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:370_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:373_1: ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ paṭhama duṭṭhadosa sikkhāpadato
anya-e0905n0:373_3: so ca āyasmā puṭṭho puṭṭho vissajjeti,
anya-e0905n0:373_4: itihidaṃ bhante sabbaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n0:373_5: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n0:373_6: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:373_7: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:376_2: sammāsambuddhena atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:378_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:381_1: ekarattaṃ āvuso ticivarena vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:383_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:384_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ hatthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:386_1: akālacīvaraṃ āvuso paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:388_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:389_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:391_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:393_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:394_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:396_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:398_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:399_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi,
anya-e0905n0:401_1: aññātakaṃ āvuso gahapatiṃvā gahatāniṃvā cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:403_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:404_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:404_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññātakaṃ seṭṭhiputtaṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:406_1: aññātakaṃ āvuso gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā tatuttari cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:408_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:409_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahumpi cīvaraṃ viññāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:410_1: pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahatāniṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa
anya-e0905n0:410_2: ca aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa ca nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0905n0:412_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:413_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:413_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji.
anya-e0905n0:413_3: Soyeva bhante āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji,
anya-e0905n0:415_1: atirekatikkhattuṃ āvuso codanāya atireka chakkhattuṃ ṭhānena cīvaraṃ abhinipphādentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:417_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:418_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:418_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto upāsakena ajjaṇho bhante āgamehīti vuccamāno nāgamesi,
anya-e0905n0:420_1: kosiyamissakaṃ āvuso santhakaṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:422_0: Pucchā – kaṃ 0 āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:423_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evamahaṃsu bahū āvuso kosakārake pacatha amhākampi
anya-e0905n0:423_3: dassatha mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santakaṃ kātunti,
anya-e0905n0:425_1: suddhakāḷakānaṃ āvuso eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:427_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:428_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:430_1: anādiyitvā āvuso tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:432_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:433_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū thokaṃyeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:435_2: sammāsambuddhena anuvassaṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:437_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:438_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:440_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:443_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:446_1: ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ imesaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṃ
anya-e0905n0:446_2: yāva chabbassasikkhāpadaṃ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n0:446_3: puṭṭhopuṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṃso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n0:446_4: itihidaṃ bhante imāni sikkhāpadāni nimmalāni suparisuddhānī tasseva bhagavato vacanāni arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n0:446_5: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n0:446_6: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu ceva anusaṃgāyiṃsu ca,
anya-e0905n0:446_7: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā chabbassa nissaggiya sikkhāpadato
anya-e0905n0:446_8: paṭṭhāya imāni nissaggiyasikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃhāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:448_2: sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidattiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:450_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:451_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññikaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ paṃsukūlakaṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:453_1: eḷakalomāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:455_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:456_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmesi,
anya-e0905n0:458_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:460_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:461_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhūnīhi eḷakalomāni dhovāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:463_0: Pucchā – rūpiyaṃ āvuso paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:465_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:466_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:466_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesi,
anya-e0905n0:467_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n0:468_4: evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n0:469_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0905n0:470_1: yathā bhante rājasikkhāpade yathā ca bhante meṇḍakasikkhāpade āgacchati,
anya-e0905n0:470_2: tathā bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhātināma.
anya-e0905n0:472_0: Pucchā – rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ āvuso samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:474_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:475_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:477_1: nānappakārakaṃ āvuso kayavikkayaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:479_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:480_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:480_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhi kayavikkayaṃ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n0:481_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n0:482_1: iminā imaṃ dehi iminā imaṃ āhara iminā imaṃ parivattehi iminā imaṃ cetāmehīti ajjhācarati,
anya-e0905n0:482_2: evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n0:483_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n0:484_3: yo ca bhante amhākañca idaṃ atthi amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇati,
anya-e0905n0:484_4: evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjatināma.
anya-e0905n0:486_0: Pucchā – atirekapattaṃ āvuso dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:488_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:491_1: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:493_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:494_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viyyāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:495_0: Na bhikkhave patto viññāpetabbo, yo viññāpeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n0:497_1: bhesajjāni āvuso paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:499_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:500_1: sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:500_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:502_1: atirekamāse sese gimāne āvuso vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:504_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:505_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:507_1: bhikkhussa āvuso sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupitena anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:509_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:510_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:510_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindi,
anya-e0905n0:512_1: sāmaṃ āvuso suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:514_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:515_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:517_1: pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:519_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:520_1: āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:520_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji,
anya-e0905n0:522_1: acceka cīvaraṃ āvuso paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:524_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:525_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:527_1: tiṇṇaṃ āvuso cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:529_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:530_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:532_1: yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ atthano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:534_0: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:535_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:536_0: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento, kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:537_1: jānaṃ bhante saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:537_4: jānaṃ bhante saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:539_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:542_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:545_1: ahaṃ bhante imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṃ nidānādīni anekāni pucchitabbāni āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0905n0:545_4: itihidaṃ bhante sikkhāpadasañjātaṃ nimmalaṃ su parisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n0:545_5: tasmā yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahāthera varā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa
anya-e0905n0:545_6: ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ
anya-e0905n0:545_8: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṃgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni yathānuppattaṭṭhānato
anya-e0905n0:548_1: yaṃ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:549_3: hatthako bhante sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāti paṭijānitvā avajānāti,
anya-e0905n0:551_1: omasavāde pācittiyañca āvuso bhikkhupesuññe pācittiyañca bhagavatā katthapaññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:552_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā omasiṃsu tasmiṃca vatthusmiṃ,
anya-e0905n0:552_4: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃhariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:554_1: anupasampannaṃ āvuso padaso vācentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:555_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:557_1: anupasampannena āvuso uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:558_3: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:559_0: Pucchā – kesaṃ āvuso ettha anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānampi anāpatti hoti.
anya-e0905n0:560_1: ekādasannaṃ bhante puggalānaṃ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānaṃ anāpatti,
anya-e0905n0:560_4: dverattiyo vasitvā tatiyāyarattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
anya-e0905n0:560_13: imesaṃkho bhante ekādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappentānaṃ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n0:562_1: mātugāmena āvuso sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:563_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:563_2: āyasmā bhante anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n0:565_1: mātugāmassa āvuso uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:566_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:568_1: anupasampannassa āvuso uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhūtaṃ ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:569_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:569_2: vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:571_1: bhikkhussa āvuso duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:572_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:572_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:575_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:577_1: bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:578_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:578_2: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū rukkhaṃ chindiṃ su,
anya-e0905n0:580_1: aññavādake vihesake pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:581_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:581_2: āyasmā bhante channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicari,
anya-e0905n0:583_1: ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:584_1: rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:584_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:586_1: saṅghikaṃ āvuso mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā bhisiṃvā kocchaṃvā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:587_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:587_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:589_1: saṅghike āvuso vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:590_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:590_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:592_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:595_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:598_1: ahaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vicittasārābhivaṃsaṃ imesaṃ pannarasannaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṃ,
anya-e0905n0:598_3: iti hidaṃ bhante nimmalaṃ suparisuddhaṃ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n0:598_4: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṃgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n0:598_5: bahujanasukhāya lonukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃgāyiṃsuceva anusaṃgāyiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:598_6: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṃgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā yathānuppaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṃ katvā saṃgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:600_2: sammāsambuddhena saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:601_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:601_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:603_1: bhikkhuṃ āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:604_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:604_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikāvihārā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:606_1: uparivehāsakuṭiyā āvuso āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:607_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:607_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdi,
anya-e0905n0:609_1: dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:610_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:610_2: āyasmā bhante chando katapariyositaṃ vihāraṃ punappunaṃ chādāpesi punappunaṃ lepāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:612_1: jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃvā mattikaṃvā siñcantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:613_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:613_2: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:615_1: asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:616_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:616_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:618_1: atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:619_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:619_2: āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi,
anya-e0905n0:621_1: bhikkhunupassayaṃ āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassaca āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti
anya-e0905n0:622_1: bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhante sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:622_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:622_3: āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:622_4: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:624_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:625_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:625_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi,
anya-e0905n0:627_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:628_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:628_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbesi,
anya-e0905n0:630_1: bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:631_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:631_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:633_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:634_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:634_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:636_1: jānaṃ āvuso bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:637_2: devadatto bhante jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n0:639_1: bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ āvuso eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:640_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:640_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n0:642_1: tatuttari āvuso āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:643_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:643_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:645_1: gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:646_2: devadatto bhante sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n0:648_1: parampara bhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:649_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:649_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:651_1: dvattipattapūraṃ pūvaṃ paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:652_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:652_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā pūvaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:654_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:657_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:660_2: sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:661_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:661_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:663_1: bhikkhuṃ āvuso bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:664_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:664_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāresi,
anya-e0905n0:666_1: vikāle āvuso khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:667_1: rājagahe bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:667_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:669_1: sannidhikārakaṃ āvuso khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:670_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:670_2: āyasmā bhante belaṭṭhasīso sannidhikārakaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n0:672_1: paṇīta bhojanāni āvuso attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:673_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:673_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:675_1: adinnaṃ āvuso mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:676_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:676_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhari,
anya-e0905n0:678_1: acelakassavā āvuso paribbājakassavā paribbājikāyavā sahatthā khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā dentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:679_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:679_2: āyasmā bhante ānando aññatarissā paribbājikāya ekaṃ maññamāno dve pūve adāsi,
anya-e0905n0:681_1: bhikkhuṃ ehāvuso gāmaṃvā nigamaṃvā piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa dāpetvāvā adāpetvāvā uyyojentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:682_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:682_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhu ehāvuso gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa adāpetvā uyyojesi,
anya-e0905n0:684_1: sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:685_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:685_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n0:687_1: mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappentassaca āvuso mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho
anya-e0905n0:688_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:688_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n0:688_3: mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0905n0:690_1: nimantitena āvuso sabhattena santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃvā pacchābhattaṃvā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:691_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:691_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajji,
anya-e0905n0:693_1: tatuttari āvuso bhesajjaṃ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:694_1: sakkesu bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:694_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahānāmena sakkena ajjaṇho bhante āgametāti vuccamānā nāgamesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:696_1: uyyuttaṃ āvuso senaṃ dassanāya gacchantassa ca atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasantassa ca uyyodhikaṃ gacchantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:697_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:697_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:697_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:697_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṃ agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:699_0: Pucchā – surāmerayapāne āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:700_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:702_0: Pucchā – aṅgulipatodake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:703_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:703_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:705_1: udake hasadhamme āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:706_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:706_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:708_0: Pucchā – anādariya āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:709_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:709_2: āyasmā bhante channo āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno anādariyaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n0:711_1: bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:712_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:714_1: jotiṃ āvuso samādahitvā visibbentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:715_1: bhaggesu bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:715_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū jotiṃ samādapetvā visibbesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:717_1: orenaddhamāsaṃ āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:718_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:718_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṃ jānitvā nahāyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:720_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:723_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viruddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:726_2: sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:727_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:727_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū attano cīvaraṃ na sañjāniṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:729_1: bhikkhussa āvuso pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidhentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:730_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:730_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:732_1: sañcicca āvuso pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:733_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n0:735_1: jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:736_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:736_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:738_1: jānaṃ āvuso theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:739_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:739_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n0:741_1: mātugāmena saddhiṃ āvuso saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:742_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:742_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n0:744_1: bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānena na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n0:744_2: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:745_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:745_2: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n0:745_3: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇi,
anya-e0905n0:747_1: vinayaṃ vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:748_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:750_0: Pucchā – mohanake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:751_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:752_1: bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāraṃ dentassa ca talasattikaṃ uggirantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:753_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:753_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahāraṃ adaṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:755_1: bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:756_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:756_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:758_1: bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādā pannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:759_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:759_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalaha jātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhahiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:761_1: dhammikānaṃ āvuso kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:762_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:762_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:764_1: saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:765_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:765_2: aññataro bhante chabbaggiyo bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi,
anya-e0905n0:767_1: jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:768_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:768_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:770_1: pubbe appaṭisaṃviditena āvuso rañño antepuraṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:771_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:771_2: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pāvisi,
anya-e0905n0:773_1: ratanaṃ āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:774_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:776_1: santaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:777_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:777_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:780_1: sekkhasammatesu āvuso kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:781_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:781_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū namattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:783_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentena nivāsentassaca pārupantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:784_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:784_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū purato ca pacchato ca olambantā nivāsesuṃceva pārupiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:785_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:786_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggīye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:786_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchiṃsu ceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:787_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kīḷāpentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n0:787_2: tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n0:787_3: ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:788_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:788_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā tahaṃ tahaṃpi olokentā antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsu ca,
anya-e0905n0:788_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:789_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ujjagghikāya vā uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontena vā antaraghare gacchantassaca nisīdantassaca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:790_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:790_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā ca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontā ca antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:791_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ vā bāhuppa cālakaṃ vā sīsappacālakaṃ vā khambhakatena vā oguṇṭhitena
anya-e0905n0:791_2: vā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca ukkuṭikāya kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:792_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:792_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṃ bāhuppacālakaṃ sīsappacālakaṃ karontā ca khambhīkatā ca oguṇṭhitā ca antaraghare gacchiṃsuceva nisīdiṃsuca,
anya-e0905n0:793_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisinnassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:794_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:794_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:795_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentena piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0905n0:795_2: paṭiggaṇhantassaca sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassaca dukkaṭaṃ
anya-e0905n0:796_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:796_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:797_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca āsakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassaca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentana piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa
anya-e0905n0:797_2: ca tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaññeva bahuṃ bhuñjantassa ca thūpakato omadditvā
anya-e0905n0:797_3: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:798_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:798_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:798_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:798_5: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṃ sūpaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:798_6: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:798_7: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:799_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca sūpaṃvā odanaṃvā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:800_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:800_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:801_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ujjhānasaññinā paresaṃ pattaṃ olokentassa ca atimahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ karontassa
anya-e0905n0:801_2: ca dīghaṃ ālopaṃ karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:802_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:802_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ujjhānasaññino paresaṃ pattaṃ olokesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:802_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atimahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ kariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:802_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghaṃ ālopaṃ kariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:803_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarantassa ca bhuñjamāne sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipantassa
anya-e0905n0:803_2: ca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharantassa ca piṇḍukkhepakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0905n0:803_3: bhuñjantassa ca avagaṇḍakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca hatthaniddhunakaṃ sitthāvakārakaṃ jivhānicchārakaṃ
anya-e0905n0:803_4: capucapukārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:804_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:804_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:805_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjantassaca hatthanillehakaṃvā pattanillehakaṃ vā oṭṭhanillehakaṃ
anya-e0905n0:805_2: vā bhuñjantassa ca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare
anya-e0905n0:806_1: suru surukārakaṃ bhante bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ kosambiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:806_3: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū surusurukārakaṃ khīraṃ piviṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:806_5: Hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa ca pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa ca oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:807_0: Sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhaggesu paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:807_2: sambahulā bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:807_3: teyeva bhante sambahulā bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:808_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desentassa ca daṇḍapāṇissa vā satthapāṇissa vā āvudhapāṇissa
anya-e0905n0:808_2: vā dhammaṃ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:809_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:809_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū chattapāṇissa daṇḍapāṇissa satthapāṇissa āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:810_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa ca upahanāruḷhassa ca yānagatassa ca sayanagatassa ca dhammaṃ desentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:811_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:811_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pādukāruḷhassa upahanāruḷhassa yānagatassa sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:812_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṃ nisīditvā
anya-e0905n0:812_2: āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitena nisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantena
anya-e0905n0:812_3: purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṃ desentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha
anya-e0905n0:813_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:813_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṃ
anya-e0905n0:813_3: nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitānisinnassa ca pacchato
anya-e0905n0:813_4: gacchantā purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṃ desesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:814_1: anādariyaṃ āvuso paṭicca ṭhitena uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karontassa ca harite vā udake vā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ
anya-e0905n0:814_2: vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:815_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:815_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ṭhitā uccārampi passāvampi akaṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:815_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū haritepi udakepi uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:818_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ āvuso pañcama pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:819_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:819_2: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n0:821_1: ussayavādikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karontiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:822_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:823_1: coriṃ āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:824_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:825_1: ekāya āvuso gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:826_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:826_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n0:827_1: avassutāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃvā bhojanīyaṃvā sahatthā
anya-e0905n0:828_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:828_2: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
anya-e0905n0:829_1: kupitāya āvuso anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsantiyā na paṭinisajjantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:830_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n0:830_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ abhaṇi,
anya-e0905n0:832_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:835_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n0:839_2: sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇaṃ khādantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:840_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:840_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:842_1: bhikkhussa āvuso bhuñjamānassa annena vā pānena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantiyā bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:843_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:843_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0905n0:845_1: uccāraṃvā āvuso passāvaṃvā saṅkāraṃvā vighāsaṃvā thirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:846_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:846_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍesi,
anya-e0905n0:848_1: naccaṃ vā āvuso gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:849_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:849_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya agamaṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:850_1: bhikkhupana āvuso naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchanto kaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:853_1: rattandhakāre āvuso apadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:854_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:854_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī rattandhakāre apadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n0:856_1: paṭicchanne vā āvuso okāse ajjhokāse vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:857_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:857_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ca purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n0:859_1: duggahitena āvuso dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:860_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:860_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:862_1: attānaṃ vā āvuso paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:863_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:863_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapi,
anya-e0905n0:865_1: attānaṃ āvuso vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:866_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:866_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodi,
anya-e0905n0:868_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentiyā na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:869_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:869_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbāpetvā neva sibbesi na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n0:871_1: agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:872_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:872_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa samaṇacīvaraṃ adāsi,
anya-e0905n0:874_1: dvinnaṃ āvuso bhikkhunīnaṃ ekamañce vā ekattharaṇapāvuraṇe vā tuvaṭṭentīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:875_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:875_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:877_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso sañcicca aphāsuṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:878_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:878_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n0:880_1: dukkhitaṃ āvuso sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhentiyā na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:881_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃyeva bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:881_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ nevaupaṭṭhesi na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0905n0:883_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso upassayaṃ datvā kupitāya anattamanāya nikkaḍḍhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:884_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃyeva bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:884_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhi,
anya-e0905n0:886_1: saṃsaṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:887_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:889_1: antoraṭṭhe vā āvuso tiroraṭṭhe vā sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāya cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:890_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:890_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhepi tiroraṭṭhepi sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo cārikaṃ cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:892_1: antovassaṃ āvuso cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:893_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:893_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:895_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cārikaṃ na pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:896_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbhaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:896_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:898_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:903_2: sammāsambuddhena rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:904_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:904_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo rājāgārampi cittāgārampi dassanāya gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:906_1: gihiveyyāvaccaṃ āvuso karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:907_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:909_1: agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:910_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:910_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi adāsi,
anya-e0905n0:912_1: tiracchānavijjaṃ āvuso pariyāpuṇantiyā ca vācentiyā ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:913_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:913_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsuceva vācesuñca,
anya-e0905n0:914_1: bhikkhu pana āvuso tādisaṃ tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanto ca vācento ca kiṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:917_1: jānaṃ āvuso sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:918_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:918_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:920_1: bhikkhuṃ āvuso akkosantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:921_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:921_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:923_1: caṇḍikatāya āvuso gaṇaṃ paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:924_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:924_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī caṇḍikatāya gaṇaṃ paribhāsi,
anya-e0905n0:926_1: kulaṃ āvuso maccharāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:927_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:929_1: abhikkhuke āvuso āvāse vassaṃ vasantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:930_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:930_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:932_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:933_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:933_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṃ vuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ na pavāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:935_1: ovādāya vā āvuso saṃvāsāya vā nagacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:936_1: sakkesu bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:938_1: uposathampi āvuso na pucchantiyā ovādampi na yācantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:939_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:939_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo uposathaṃ na pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:941_1: gabbhiniṃ vā āvuso pāyantiṃ vā vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:942_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:944_1: dve vassāni āvuso chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:945_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:945_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:947_1: purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ āvuso kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:948_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:948_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sekkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:950_1: mātāpitūhi vā āvuso sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:951_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:951_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n0:953_1: chattupāhanaṃ āvuso dhārentiyā ca yānena yāyantiyā ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:954_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:956_1: itthālaṅkāraṃ āvuso dhārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:957_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:958_0: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso purisālaṅkāraṃ dhārento kiṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0905n0:961_1: gandhavaṇṇakena āvuso nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:962_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:964_1: bhikkhussa āvuso purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:965_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:965_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:967_1: anokāsakataṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:968_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:968_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:969_1: sappiṃ vā āvuso telaṃ vā madhuṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā macchaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā khīraṃ vā dadhiṃ vā viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:970_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:970_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo sappimpi telampi madhumpi phāṇitampi macchampi maṃsampi khīrampi dadhimpi viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:971_0: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:973_0: Pucchā – channaṃ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:974_4: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n0:974_6: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, navācato,
anya-e0905n0:974_7: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n0:980_1: na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
anya-e0905n0:982_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:988_1: ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṃ āvuso porāṇakehi saṃgītikāramahātherehi kaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgītaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:989_0: Vissajjanā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṃ bhante porāṇakehi saṃgītikāramahātherehi khandhakā saṃgītā.
anya-e0905n0:990_0: Pucchā – te pana āvuso khandhakā vaggabhedena katividhā.
anya-e0905n0:991_0: Vissajjanā – te pana bhante khandhakā duvidhā vaggabhedena mahāvaggo cūḷavaggoti.
anya-e0905n0:992_0: Pucchā – mahāvagge āvuso kati khandhakā pariyāpannā.
anya-e0905n0:993_3: mahākhandhako uposathakkhandhako vassūpanāyikakkhandhako pavāraṇākkhandhako cammakkhandhako bhesajjakkhandhako
anya-e0905n0:994_0: Pucchā – mahākhandhake āvuso bahū kathāyo, katamā tāsaṃ ādikathā.
anya-e0905n0:998_1: tasmātiha āvuso tato paṭṭhāya taṃ pucchissāmi,
anya-e0905n0:998_2: bhagavā āvuso paṭhamābhisambuddhakāle kattha kīvacīraṃ kenākārena vihāsi.
anya-e0905n0:999_1: bhagavā bhante paṭhamābhisambuddho bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena vihāsi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n0:1000_0: Pucchā – tadā āvuso bhagavā kīdisaṃ dhammaṃ manasikatvā kīdisaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
anya-e0905n0:1001_1: tadā bhante bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1001_2: anulomaṃ paṭilomaṃ manasikatvā tīṇi udānāni udānesi.
anya-e0905n0:1003_0: Pucchā – tassa āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n0:1004_1: tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā ajapāla nigrodhamūle vihāsi,
anya-e0905n0:1006_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n0:1007_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā mucalindamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
anya-e0905n0:1008_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n0:1009_1: tassapi bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
anya-e0905n0:1010_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n0:1011_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā punadeva ajapālanigrodhamūle vihāsi.
anya-e0905n0:1012_0: Pucchā – tasmiṃ pana āvuso ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato kathaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n0:1013_1: tasmiṃ pana bhante ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa dhammagambhīratāpaṭisaṃyutto cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n0:1014_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso aranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacarā nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
anya-e0905n0:1017_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tadā dhammadesanāya brahmayācanā ca bhagavato paṭiññāca ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1018_3: santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti,
anya-e0905n0:1018_4: bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāroti iti bhante brahmuno dhammadesanāya yācanā ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1023_0: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato dhammadesanāya paṭiññā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1028_1: evaṃ kho āvuso bhagavā dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desento kattha kīdisaṃ dhammaṃ kassa desesi.
anya-e0905n0:1029_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiya bhikkhupamukhānaṃ brahmagaṇānaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ desesi.
anya-e0905n0:1030_1: tasmiṃ kho pana āvuso dhammacakkapavattanasutte desiyamāne manussaloke kassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1031_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmato bhante koṇḍaññassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1032_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ nu kho āvuso imasmiṃ buddhasāsane paṭhamaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1033_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante buddhasāsane paṭhamaṃ ehibhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1034_0: Labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1035_0: Ehi bhikkhu svākhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n0:1036_0: Pucchā – itaresaṃ pana āvuso catunnaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ kadā dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1037_4: catutthe bhante divase āyasmato assajissa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1038_0: Pucchā – sabbesampi āvuso tesaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kadā arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n0:1039_1: sabbesampi bhante tesaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakkhassa pañcamiyaṃ anattalakkhaṇasutte desiyamāne arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n0:1040_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n0:1041_1: yasappamukhānaṃ bhante catupaññāsa sahāyakānaṃ pabbajitakāle bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n0:1043_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjūpa sampadā anuññāto ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1044_1: yasappamukhānaṃ bhante catupaññāsāya gihi sahāyakānaṃ pabbajitvā tattha tattha cārikaṃ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya
anya-e0905n0:1044_2: pesitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca anuññātā.
anya-e0905n0:1045_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādetha.
anya-e0905n0:1046_0: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ ārāmo paṭiggaṇhituṃ kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n0:1047_1: bhagavatā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ ārāmaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ rājagahe anuññāto,
anya-e0905n0:1047_2: rājā bhante māgadho seniyo bimbisāro buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0905n0:1048_0: Etāhaṃ bhante veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammi –
anya-e0905n0:1050_0: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ pabbajjūpasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1051_0: Vissajjanā – dvinnaṃ bhante aggasāvakānaṃ ehi bhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1058_0: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato;
anya-e0905n0:1059_0: Āha tesañca yo nirodho, evaṃ vādī mahāsamaṇo.
anya-e0905n0:1061_0: Ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito upatisso ca etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1062_0: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1063_0: Etha bhikkhavo svākhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
anya-e0905n0:1064_0: Pucchā – upajjhāyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n0:1065_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n0:1065_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anokappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1066_1: upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1067_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1067_2: sambahulā bhante saddhivihārikā upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1068_1: kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñāticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n0:1069_1: rādhabrāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñātticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n0:1070_0: Konu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarati.
anya-e0905n0:1071_0: Ahaṃ kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarāmi.
anya-e0905n0:1072_0: Sādhu sādhu sāriputta, kataññuno hi sāriputta sappurisā katavedino.
anya-e0905n0:1074_0: Yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadāanuññātā, taṃ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
anya-e0905n0:1076_1: ayācitakaṃ āvuso upasampadāpekkhaṃ upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1077_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1077_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraṃ anācāraṃ acari,
anya-e0905n0:1078_1: catunnaṃ āvuso nissayānaṃ ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1079_1: rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1079_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji,
anya-e0905n0:1081_0: Kathañhi nāma bhikkhu evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati.
anya-e0905n0:1082_1: ūnadasavassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1083_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1083_2: āyasmā bhante upaseno vaṅgantaputto ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi,
anya-e0905n0:1084_1: bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1085_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1085_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū “dasavassamhā dasavassamhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1086_0: Pucchā – ācariyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n0:1087_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n0:1087_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi anācariyakā
anya-e0905n0:1087_3: anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1088_1: pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1089_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1089_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1090_0: Sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ na pabbājeyyuṃ…
anya-e0905n0:1091_1: rājabhaṭaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1092_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1093_1: dhajabandhaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1094_1: rājagaheyeva bhante aṅgulimālaṃ coraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1094_2: aṅgulimālo bhante coro bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n0:1095_1: kārabhedakaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1096_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1097_1: iṇāyikaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1098_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1099_1: dāsaṃ āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1100_1: rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1101_1: bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1102_1: rājagaheyeva bhante aññataraṃ kammārabhaṇḍuputtaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ aññataro bhante kammārabhaṇḍuputto
anya-e0905n0:1102_2: mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n0:1103_1: ūnavīsativassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1104_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1104_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1105_0: Na bhikkhave jānaṃ ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo, youpasampādeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo.
anya-e0905n0:1106_1: mātāpitūhi āvuso ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1107_2: rājā bhante suddhodano bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā varaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n0:1107_3: sādhu bhante ayyāananuññātaṃ mātāpitūhi puttaṃ pabbājeyyunti,
anya-e0905n0:1108_0: Na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpattidukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n0:1109_1: theyyasaṃvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1110_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ purāṇakulaputtaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1110_2: aññataro bhante purāṇakulaputto khīṇa kolañño sāmaṃ pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni
anya-e0905n0:1110_3: vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvasi,
anya-e0905n0:1111_1: tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1112_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ nāgaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1112_2: aññataro bhante nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n0:1113_1: mātughātakassa ca āvuso pitughātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1114_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n0:1114_2: aññataro ca bhante māṇavako aññataro ca māṇavako mātaraṃ jīvitā voropesi pitaraṃ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n0:1116_1: apattacīvarakaṃ vā āvuso yācitapattacīvarakaṃ vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1117_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1118_0: Pucchā – upasampadaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ sauddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1119_0: Vissajjanā – upasampadaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1121_1: cātuddase ca āvuso pannarase ca pakkhassa ca aṭṭhamiyā sannipatitvā dhammaṃ bhāsituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1122_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1122_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū cātuddesa pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1123_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatituṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1125_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddeso bhagavatā anuññāto.
anya-e0905n0:1126_1: yadā bhante bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni,
anya-e0905n0:1126_3: so nesaṃ bhavissati uposathakamma”nti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddeso anuññāto.
