anya-e0905n0:1127_0: Pucchā – sīmaṃ āvuso sammanituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kismiñca vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1128_2: rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “bhagavatā paññattaṃ ettāvatā sāmaggī,
anya-e0905n0:1129_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathā divasavasena ca kārakapuggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n0:1131_1: kati āvuso uposathakammāni tesu ca kīdisaṃ uposathakammaṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1132_6: Tatra bhante yadidaṃ adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1132_7: adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1132_9: tatra bhante yadidaṃ dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1133_0: Pucchā – uposathaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1134_0: Vissajjanā – uposathaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1136_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1137_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1137_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṃ cariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1139_1: dvemā bhante vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā purimikā pacchimikā,
anya-e0905n0:1139_4: imā kho bhante dve vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n0:1140_1: vassaṃ āvuso upagantvā purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā cārikaṃ pakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1141_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1141_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vassaṃ upagantvā antarā vassaṃ cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1142_1: sattāha karaṇīyena āvuso pahite gantuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1143_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1143_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū udenena upāsakena pahite na gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1144_1: sattāhakaraṇīyena āvuso sattannaṃ apahitepi gantuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1145_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātugilāna vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1146_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave sattannaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena apahitepi gantuṃ, pageva pahite.
anya-e0905n0:1147_1: kismiṃci āvuso antarāye sati antovassaṃ pakkamituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1148_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1148_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1149_1: rukkha susire vā āvuso rukkhaviṭabhiyā vā ajjhokāse vā vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1150_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1150_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rukkhasusirepi rukkhaviṭabhiyāpi ajjhokāsepi vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1151_1: asenāsanikena āvuso vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1152_1: tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1152_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1153_1: chavakuṭikāya vā āvuso chatte vā cāṭiyā vā vassaṃ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1154_1: sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1154_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chavakuṭikāyapi chattepi cāṭiyāpi vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1155_1: paṭissavaṃ āvuso visaṃ vādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1156_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1156_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassaṃ vāsaṃ paṭissuṇitvā visaṃvādesi,
anya-e0905n0:1157_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1160_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavārituṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1161_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1161_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sandiṭṭhā sambhattā antovassaṃ neva ālapiṃsu na sallapiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1162_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave vassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1162_1: diṭṭheva vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
anya-e0905n0:1163_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso pavāraṇā divasavasena ca puggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n0:1164_0: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tisso pavāraṇā, tathā puggalavasena kātabbākāravasenaca.
anya-e0905n0:1165_1: katīnaṃ āvuso saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1165_2: katīnaṃ panāvuso aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1166_1: pañcannaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1166_2: catunnaṃ vā bhante tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1167_0: Pucchā – ekena panāvuso vassaṃvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1168_0: Vissajjanā – ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā “ajja me pavāraṇā”ti adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1169_0: Pucchā – pavāraṇaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1170_0: Vissajjanā – pavāraṇaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1173_0: Pucchā – upāhanaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1174_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1174_2: āyasmato bhante soṇassa accāraddhavīriyassa caṅkamato pādā bhijjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1175_1: sabbanīlikā vā āvuso sabbapītikā vā sabbalohitikā vā sabbamañjiṭṭhikā vā sabbakaṇhā vā sabbamahāraṅgarattā
anya-e0905n0:1175_2: vā sabbamahānāmarattā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0905n0:1176_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1176_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlikāyo upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1176_3: sabbapītikāyo sabbalohitikāyo sabbamañjiṭṭhikāyo sabbakaṇhāyo sabbamahāraṅgarattā sabbamahānāmarattāyopi upāhanāyo dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1177_1: khallakabandhā vā āvuso puṭabandhā vā pāliguṇṭhimā vā tūlapuṇṇikā vā tittirapattikā vā meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā
anya-e0905n0:1177_2: vā ajavisāṇavaddhikā vā vicchikāḷikā vā morapiñcha parisibbikā vā citrā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1178_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1178_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū khallakabandhā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1179_1: kaṭṭhapādukāyo āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1180_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggīyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1180_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya kaṭṭhapādukāyo abhiruhitvā ajjhokāse caṅkamanti
anya-e0905n0:1180_3: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā khaṭakhaṭasaddā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentā,
anya-e0905n0:1181_1: yānena āvuso yāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1182_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1183_0: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso yānaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1184_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ gilānaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1184_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya antarāmagge gilāno kukkuccāyanto yānaṃ nābhiruhi,
anya-e0905n0:1185_1: uccāsayanamahāsayanāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1186_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1187_1: gocammāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1188_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1189_1: paccantimesu āvuso janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā ca guṇaṅguṇūpahanañca dhuvanahānañca
anya-e0905n0:1189_2: cammāni attharaṇāni ca nissīmagatānaṃ cīvaradānañcāti imāni pañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n0:1190_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ kuṭikaṇṇaṃ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1190_2: āyasmā bhante soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo etāni pañcavatthūni āyasmato mahākaccānassa vacanena bhagavantaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n0:1191_0: Pucchā – cammasaññuttaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1194_1: pañca āvuso bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1195_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1195_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ sāradikena ābādhena puṭṭhānaṃ yāgupi na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n0:1195_3: bhattampi bhuttaṃ na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchi,
anya-e0905n0:1195_4: te tena kisā ahesuṃ lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā,
anya-e0905n0:1197_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule gilāne bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n0:1197_2: sambahulānaṃ gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mūlehi bhesajjehi attho ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1198_1: antovuṭṭhaṃvā āvuso antopakkaṃ vā sāmaṃpakkaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1199_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1199_2: āyasmā bhante ānando sāmaṃ tilampi taṇḍulampi muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṃ paci,
anya-e0905n0:1201_1: manussamaṃsaṃ āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭañca bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1202_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1202_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu appaṭivekkhitvā manussamaṃsaṃ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n0:1203_3: na ca bhikkhave appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1204_1: hatthimaṃsaṃ vā āvuso assamaṃsaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1205_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1205_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hatthimaṃsampi assamaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1206_1: sunakkhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso ahimaṃsaṃ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1207_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1207_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sunakkhamaṃsampi ahimaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1208_1: sīhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso byagghamaṃsaṃ vā dīpimaṃsaṃ vā acchamaṃsaṃ vā taracchamaṃsaṃ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1209_1: bārāṇasiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1209_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sīhamaṃsampi byagghamaṃsampi dīpimaṃsampi acchamaṃsampi taracchamaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1210_1: gilānassa āvuso guḷaṃ vā agilānassa guḷodakaṃ vā bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1211_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1211_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññāto no agilānassāti kukkuccāyantā guḷaṃ na bhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1212_1: jānaṃ āvuso uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ maṃsaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1213_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sīhassa seṭāpatino vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1215_1: pātheyyaṃ āvuso pariyesituñca kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe upanikkhittahiraññato nibbattaṃ kappiyapaccayaṃ sādituñca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1216_1: antarā ca bhante bhaddiyaṃ antarā ca aṅguttarāpaṃ meṇḍakaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1216_2: meṇḍako bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ yāci “santi bhante maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1216_3: sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1218_0: Pucchā – aṭṭha āvuso pānāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n0:1219_1: āpaṇe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n0:1219_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā pānāni na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1221_1: sabbañca āvuso ḍākaṃ sabbañca piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1222_1: kusinārāyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1222_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca na paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1223_1: akappiyaṃ āvuso samādapentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1224_1: ātumāyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1225_1: saṅghikāni vā āvuso puggalikāni vā bījāni puggalikāya vā saṅghikāya vā bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1226_2: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghikānipi bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropiyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1227_1: vinayamahāpadesasaṅkhātāni āvuso cattāri kappiyākappiyaanulomāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n0:1228_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n0:1228_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ kismiñci kismiñciṭhāne kukkuccaṃ uppajji,
anya-e0905n0:1229_1: yāvakālikādīhi saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ āvuso yāmakālikādīnaṃ paribhogakālamariyādaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1230_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1230_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “kappati nukho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1231_0: Pucchā – bhesajjakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1234_1: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1235_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1235_2: tiṃsamattā bhante pāveyyakā bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
anya-e0905n0:1236_0: Pucchā – kathinakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1240_1: gahapaticīvaraṃ āvuso sādiyituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1241_1: rājagahe bhante jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1241_2: jīvako bhante komārabhacco bhikkhūnaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ anujānituṃ bhagavantaṃ yāci,
anya-e0905n0:1242_0: Pucchā – cha āvuso rajanāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n0:1243_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n0:1243_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chakaṇenapi paṇḍumattikāyapi cīvaraṃ rajiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1244_1: acchinnakāni āvuso cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1245_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1245_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū acchinnakāni cīvarāni dhāresuṃ dantakasāvāni,
anya-e0905n0:1246_1: kadā āvuso bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1247_1: dakkhiṇāgirito bhante pacchāgatakāle bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1248_1: aggaḷaṃ ca āvuso tunnañca ovaṭṭikañca kaṇḍusakañca daḷhīkammañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1249_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1250_1: vassikasāṭikā ca āvuso āgantukabhattañca gamikabhattañca gilānabhattañca gilānupaṭṭhākabhattañca gilānabhesajjañca
anya-e0905n0:1250_2: dhuvayāgu ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakasāṭikācāti imā aṭṭha bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1251_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1251_2: visākhā bhante migāramātā bhagavantaṃ aṭṭhavarāni yāci,
anya-e0905n0:1252_1: bhagavatā āvuso mātāpitūnaṃ dānaṃ anujānitvā saddhādeyyaṃ vinipātentassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1253_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1253_2: aññatarassa bhante bhikkhuno bahuṃ cīvaraṃ uppannaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1253_3: so ca taṃcīvaraṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dātukāmo ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1254_0: Mātāpitaroti kho bhikkhave dadamāne kiṃ vadeyyāma,
anya-e0905n0:1255_1: aññatra vassaṃ vuṭṭhena āvuso aññatra cīvarabhāgaṃ sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1256_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1256_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññatra vassaṃ vuṭṭho aññatra cīvarabhāgaṃ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n0:1257_1: anāthakaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ gilānaṃ na upaṭṭhahantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1258_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1258_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno kucchivikārābādho ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1259_1: naggiyaṃ āvuso titthiyasamādānaṃ samādiyantassa thullaccayaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1260_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1260_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu naggiyaṃ titthiyasamādānaṃ samādiyi,
anya-e0905n0:1261_1: sabbanīlakāni vā āvuso cīvarāni sabbapītakāni vā sabbalohitakāni vā sabbamañjiṭṭhakāni vā sabbakaṇhānivāti
anya-e0905n0:1261_2: evarūpāni cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1262_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1262_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlakādīni cīvarāni dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1263_1: kañcukaṃ vā āvuso veṭhanaṃ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1264_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1264_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kañcukampi dhāresuṃ veṭhanampi dhāresuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1265_0: Pucchā – cīvarasaññuttaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1268_1: suddhaṃ āvuso bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1269_1: campāyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1269_2: bhagavati bhante campāyaṃ viharati sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu vāsabhagāme suddhaṃ kassapagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1270_0: Pucchā – campeyyakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1271_0: Vissajjanā – campeyyakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1273_1: bhedagarukehi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi na so bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhipitabboti ca,
anya-e0905n0:1273_2: bhedagarukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā paresampi saddhāya āpattidesetabbāti ca āvuso ayaṃ sāmaggirasaovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n0:1274_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha dinno,
anya-e0905n0:1274_2: bhagavati bhante kosambiyaṃ viharati aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1274_3: so tassā āpattiyā āpatti diṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1274_4: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā anāpatti diṭṭhino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1274_5: So aparena samayena tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1274_6: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino ahesuṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1274_7: Atha kho te bhante bhikkhū sāmaggiṃ labhitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1275_1: saṅghabhedassa āvuso mūlabhūte bhikkhumhi ukkhittake osārite tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiñca
anya-e0905n0:1275_2: kātuṃ sāmaggī uposathañca kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1276_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante teyeva ukkhittakānuvattake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1276_2: te bhante ukkhittakānuvattakā bhikkhū taṃ ukkhittakaṃ bhikkhuṃ osāretvā yena ukkhepakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu
anya-e0905n0:1276_3: upasaṅkamitvā te ukkhepake bhikkhū ekadavocuṃ “yasmiṃ āvuso vatthusmiṃ ahosi saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho
anya-e0905n0:1276_4: viggaho vivādo saṅghabhedo saṅgharāji saṅghavavatthānaṃ saṅghanānākaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1276_5: so eso bhikkhuṃ āpanno ca ukkhitto ca passi ca osārito ca,
anya-e0905n0:1276_6: handa mayaṃ āvuso tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṃ karomā”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1277_0: Pucchā – kosambakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1278_0: Vissajjanā – kosambakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1281_1: bhaṇḍanādikārakassa āvuso bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1282_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paṇḍukalohitake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1282_2: paṇḍukalohitakā bhante bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā,
anya-e0905n0:1282_3: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0905n0:1282_4: evamāhaṃsu “mā kho tumhe āyasmanto eso ajesi,
anya-e0905n0:1282_6: tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca,
anya-e0905n0:1282_10: uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0905n0:1283_1: tajjanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1284_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa tajjanīyakammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṃ anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1284_2: teyeva paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattitvā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāciṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1285_1: bālassa āvuso abyattassa āpattibahulassa anapadānassa gihisaṃsaṭṭhassa ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi niyassakammaṃ kātuṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1286_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1286_2: āyasmā bhante seyyasako bālo ahosi abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno gihisaṃsaṭṭho vihāsi ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi,
anya-e0905n0:1287_1: niyassakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1288_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa niyassa kammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1288_7: evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattantassa niyassakammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1289_1: kuladūsakassa āvuso pāpasamācārassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1290_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1290_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū kīṭāgirismiṃ kuladūsakā ahesuṃ pāpasamācārā,
anya-e0905n0:1291_2: saddhaṃ āvuso pasannaṃ gahapatiṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsentassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1292_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1292_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1292_3: dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsesi hīnena vambhesi,
anya-e0905n0:1293_0: Tenahi bhikkhave saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ karotu “citto te gahapati khamāpetabbo”ti –
anya-e0905n0:1294_1: paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno anudūtaṃ dātuñca tena anudūtena saddhiṃ gantvā yathākhuṃsitaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1294_2: gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ ca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1295_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva sudhammaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1295_2: āyasmā bhante sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1296_1: paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1297_1: aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa paṭisāraṇīya kammakatassa bhikkhuno taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1298_1: āpattiṃ āvuso āpajjitvā taṃ āpattiṃ passituṃ vā paṭikātuṃ vā na icchantassa bhikkhuno āpattiyā adassane
anya-e0905n0:1298_2: vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1299_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1299_2: āyasmā bhante channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchi taṃ āpattiṃ passituṃ vā paṭikātuṃ vā,
anya-e0905n0:1300_1: āpattiyā āvuso adassanena vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīya kammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1301_0: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1302_1: ukkhepanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno sammā vattantassa taṃ kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1303_1: kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva channaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1303_2: āyasmā bhante channo saṅghena āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattesi
anya-e0905n0:1303_3: lomaṃpātesi netthāraṃ vattesi saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiyā yāci,
anya-e0905n0:1304_1: pāpikaṃ āvuso diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na paṭinissajjantassa pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1305_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1305_2: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṃ viharati ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1305_3: diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ ahosi “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
anya-e0905n0:1306_1: pāpikāya āvuso diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1307_0: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1308_0: Pucchā – kammakkhandhakaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidāni saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1311_1: pārivāsikassa āvuso pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanādīni sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1312_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pārivāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1312_2: pārivāsikā bhante bhikkhū sādiyiṃsu pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanādīni,
anya-e0905n0:1313_0: Pucchā – pārivāsikena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1314_0: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikena bhante bhikkhunā catunavutiyā vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1315_0: Pucchā – pārivāsikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1316_0: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1318_0: Pucchā – samuccayaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1319_0: Vissajjanā – samuccayaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1321_1: asammukhībhūtānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyaṃ vā niyassaṃ vā pabbājanīyaṃ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṃ vā ukkhepanīyaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1321_2: vā kammaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1322_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1322_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ akaṃsu tajjanīyampi niyassampi pabbājanīyampi paṭisāraṇīyampi ukkhepanīyampi,
anya-e0905n0:1323_1: sativepullapattassa āvuso bhikkhuno sativinayaṃ dānaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1324_1: rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0905n0:1326_5: tassa saṅgho sativinayaṃ deti dhammena samaggena,
anya-e0905n0:1326_6: imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni sati vinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n0:1327_1: amūḷhassa āvuso bhikkhuno amūḷhavinayaṃ dātuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1328_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1328_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū gaggaṃ bhikkhuṃ ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codesuṃ “saratā yasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1328_3: so evaṃ vadeti “ahaṃ kho āvuso ummattako ahosi cittavipariyāsakato,
anya-e0905n0:1328_4: tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1328_7: Evampi naṃ vuccamānā codenteva “saratā yasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1329_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n0:1330_2: idha bhante bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno hoti,
anya-e0905n0:1330_3: tamenaṃ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1330_4: so saramānova evaṃ vadeti “na kho ahaṃ āvuso sarāmi evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti.
anya-e0905n0:1330_5: Añño saramānova evaṃ vadeti “sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvuso yathā supinantenā”ti.
anya-e0905n0:1330_6: Añño anummattakova ummattakālayaṃ karoti “ahampi kho evaṃ karomi,
anya-e0905n0:1330_12: Imāni kho bhante tīṇi adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n0:1331_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n0:1332_2: idha bhante bhikkhu ummattako hoti cittavipariyāsakato tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1332_3: tamenaṃ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1332_4: so assaramānova evaṃ vadeti “na kho ahaṃ āvuso sarāmi evarūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitā”ti.
anya-e0905n0:1332_5: Aññopi assaramānova evaṃ vadeti “sarāmi kho ahaṃ āvuso yathā supinantenā”ti.
anya-e0905n0:1332_6: Aññopi ummattakova ummattakālayaṃ karoti “ahampi evaṃ karomi,
anya-e0905n0:1332_10: Esaṃ bhante tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho amūḷhavinayaṃ deti,
anya-e0905n0:1332_12: Imāni kho bhante tīṇi dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n0:1333_1: appaṭiññāya āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyādīni kammāni karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1334_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1334_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū appaṭiññāya bhikkhūnaṃ kammāni akaṃsu tajjanīyādīni,
anya-e0905n0:1335_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso adhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1336_1: aññathā bhante āpattiṃ āpajjantassa aññathā paṭijānantassa yathā so paṭijānāti,
anya-e0905n0:1336_3: evaṃ kho bhante adhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1337_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso dhammikaṃ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1338_1: yaṃ bhante āpattiṃ āpajjantassa tameva paṭijānantassa teneva saṅgho kāreti,
anya-e0905n0:1339_1: yebhuyyasikāya āvuso adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1340_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1340_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā vihariṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1341_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso adhikaraṇaṃ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1342_1: pañcahi bhante aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu salākaggāhāpako sammannitabbo,
anya-e0905n0:1342_2: tena bhante salākaggāhāpakena salākā gāhātabbā yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1342_3: evaṃ kho bhante yebhuyyasikāya adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1344_12: ime kho bhante dasa adhammikā kalākaggāhā.
anya-e0905n0:1346_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante dhammikā salākaggāhā vuttavipariyāyena.
anya-e0905n0:1347_1: pāpussannassa āvuso bhikkhussa tassa pāpiyasikā kammaṃ kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1348_1: rājagahe bhante upavāḷaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1348_2: upavāḷo bhante bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
anya-e0905n0:1349_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n0:1350_1: pañcimāni bhante dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n0:1350_5: tassa saṅgho tassapāpiyasikā kammaṃ karoti dhammena samaggena,
anya-e0905n0:1350_6: imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni tassa pāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n0:1351_0: Pucchā – tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1352_1: tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena bhante bhikkhunā aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1352_5: evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1353_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni.
anya-e0905n0:1354_3: imāni bhante cattāri adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni.
anya-e0905n0:1360_2: atti bhante āpatti kāyato samuṭṭhāti na vācato na cittato,

anya-e0905n0:1360_7: atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti,

anya-e0905n0:1362_0: Vissajjanā – kiccādhikaraṇassa bhante ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho.
anya-e0905n0:1363_0: Pucchā – samathaṃ āvuso pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1366_1: nahāyantena āvuso bhikkhunā rukkhe vā thambhe vā kuṭṭe vā kāyaṃ ugghaṃsentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1368_1: gandhabbahatthakena vā āvuso kuruvindakasuttiyā vā mallakena vā nahāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1374_1: dīghe āvuso kese dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1379_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1382_1: mukhālepanādīni āvuso karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1383_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1384_1: naccaṃ vā āvuso gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1385_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1385_2: chabbaggiyā bhante naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1386_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso naccādīni passantassa āpatti hoti, kathaṃ pana anāpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1387_1: naccaṃ vā bhante gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n0:1387_2: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa,

anya-e0905n0:1387_6: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n0:1387_9: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n0:1387_11: gīvaṃ parivattetvā passato pana āpatti bhante.
anya-e0905n0:1388_1: āyatakena āvuso gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1392_0: Na ca bhikkhave dārupatto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa –
anya-e0905n0:1393_1: bhagavatā āvuso uccāvace patte paṭikkhipitvā ayo patto bhūmipattoti imeyeva dve pattā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1394_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā,

anya-e0905n0:1396_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1396_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sodakaṃ pattaṃ paṭisāmesuṃ, otāpesuṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1400_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,

anya-e0905n0:1401_0: Pucchā – upāhanatthavikā āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.

anya-e0905n0:1431_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsupi vācesumpi,

anya-e0905n0:1437_0: Pucchā – khuddakavatthuṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1438_0: Vissajjanā – khuddakaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1440_0: Pucchā – pañca āvuso leṇāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n0:1441_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n0:1441_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ “rājagahako bhante seṭṭhī vihāre kārāpetukāmo,
anya-e0905n0:1442_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso vihārā paṭhamaṃ uppannā, kathañca te patiṭṭhāpi tā.
anya-e0905n0:1443_1: ekāheneva bhante rājagahakena seṭṭhinā chaṭṭhivihārā patiṭṭhāpitā,
anya-e0905n0:1443_2: te idha bhante saṭṭhivihārā buddhappamukhassa āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa patiṭṭhāpitā.
anya-e0905n0:1444_1: vihāre āvuso paṭibhānakammaṃ paṭikkhipitvā mālākammādīni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n0:1445_1: rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n0:1445_2: Chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vihāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kārāpesuṃ itthirūpakaṃ purisarūpakaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1446_1: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ āvuso abhivādanādīni ca aggāsanādīni ca anujānitvā saṅghikaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1447_1: antarā ca bhante vesāliṃ antarā ca sāvatthiṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1447_2: chabbaggiyānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikā bhikkhū buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre paṭiggahesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1448_1: ekena āvuso dve paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1449_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1449_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto eko dve paṭibāhi,
anya-e0905n0:1450_1: navakena āvuso uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ uccatare vā dhammagāravena,
anya-e0905n0:1450_2: therena pana bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ nīcatare vā dhammagāravena bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1451_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1451_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1451_3: āyasmā bhante upāli ṭhitakova uddisati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāravena,
anya-e0905n0:1451_4: tattha bhante therā ceva bhikkhū kilamiṃsu āyasmā ca upāli kilami,
anya-e0905n0:1452_1: tivassantarena āvuso saha nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1453_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1453_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “kittāvatānu kho samānāsaniko hotī”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1454_1: mañce ca āvuso pīṭhe ca dvinnaṃyeva nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1455_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule samānāsanike ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1455_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū samānāsanikā mañce nisīditvā mañcaṃ bhindiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1456_1: dīghāsane panāvuso asamānāsanikehipi nisīdituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1457_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1457_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū dīghāsane asamānāsanikehi saha nisīdituṃ kukkuccāyiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1458_1: pañca āvuso avissajjiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n0:1459_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n0:1459_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vissajjesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1460_1: pañca āvuso avebhaṅgiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n0:1461_1: kīṭāgirismiṃ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n0:1461_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ vibhajiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1462_1: aññatra paribhogaṃ āvuso aññatra paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1463_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1463_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatarassa upāsakassa vihāraparibhogaṃ senāsanaṃ aññatra paribhuñjiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1464_1: adhotehi ca āvuso allehi ca pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamantassa ca saupāhanena senāsanaṃ akkamantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1465_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1465_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi senāsanaṃ akkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1466_1: parikammakatāya āvuso bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhantassa ca parikammakataṃ bhittiṃ apassayantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1467_1: āḷaviyaṃ bhante sambahuleva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1467_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū parikammakatāya bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1471_1: kathaṃ āvuso channaṃ sakyakumārānaṃ saha upālikappakena pabbajjā ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1472_1: bhagavā bhante upāliṃ kappakaṃ paṭhamaṃ pabbājesi,
anya-e0905n0:1472_3: atha bhante āyasmā bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tisso vijjā sacchākāsi,
anya-e0905n0:1472_7: Evaṃ kho bhante channaṃ sakyakumārānaṃ upālikappakena saha pabbajjā ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1472_8: evañca pana bhante tesaṃ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0905n0:1474_1: pakāsanīyakammaṃ āvuso kātuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1475_2: devadatto bhante “sarājikāya maṃ bhagavā parisāya kheḷāsakavādena apasādeti,
anya-e0905n0:1475_3: sāriputtamoggallāneva ukkaṃsatī”ti kupito anattamano bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhi,
anya-e0905n0:1477_0: Pucchā – devadattassa āvuso pakāsanīyakammaṃ kārāpetvā kathaṃ bhagavā pakāsetuṃ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n0:1478_1: bhagavā bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ kātuṃ paññapetvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi “tena hi tvaṃ sāriputta devadattaṃ rājagahe pakāsehī”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1478_2: evaṃ kho bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā devadattaṃ rājagahe pakāsetuṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n0:1480_1: kathaṃ āvuso devadattena duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathā gatassa ruhiraṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ ānantariyaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1481_1: bhagavā bhante gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṃ caṅkami,
anya-e0905n0:1481_2: atha bhante devadatto gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ āruhitvā mahatiṃ silaṃ pavijjhi “imāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1481_3: atha kho bhante dve pabbatakūṭāni samāgantvā taṃ silaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1481_4: tato papatikā uppatitvā bhagavato pāde ruhiraṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0905n0:1481_5: Evaṃ kho bhante devadattena duṭṭhena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa ruhiraṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ upacitaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1482_1: kulesu āvuso tikabhojanaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1483_2: devadatto bhante parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n0:1484_3: garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedotiādiko āvuso ovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n0:1486_0: Alaṃ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedo –
anya-e0905n0:1487_5: āvuso idaṃ udānaṃ bhagavatā kattha udānitaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1488_2: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi,
anya-e0905n0:1488_3: atha kho bhante devadatto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0905n0:1488_4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “ajjatagge dānāhaṃ āvuso ānanda aññatreva bhagavatā aññatreva
anya-e0905n0:1489_0: Sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhuṃ, sādhuṃ pāpena dukkaraṃ;
anya-e0905n0:1491_1: bhedānuvattakānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ thullaccayaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1492_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1492_2: āyasmā bhante sāriputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sādhu bhante bhedānuvattakā bhikkhū puna upasampajjeyyu”nti,
anya-e0905n0:1494_1: kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgharāji hoti no ca saṅghabhedo,
anya-e0905n0:1494_2: kittāvatā ca pana saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n0:1495_3: salākaṃ gāheti “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ imaṃ gaṇhatha imaṃ rocethāti”,
anya-e0905n0:1495_4: eteneva bhante nayena catunnaṃ vā pañcannaṃ vā channaṃ vā sattannaṃ vā aṭṭhannaṃ vā saṅgharāji hoti,
anya-e0905n0:1495_9: salākaṃ gāheti “ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ imaṃ gaṇhatha imaṃ rocethā”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1495_10: evaṃ kho bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n0:1495_13: evañca pana bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n0:1496_0: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n0:1497_1: idha bhante bhikkhū adhammādiṃ dhammādīnīti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n0:1497_7: evaṃ kho bhante saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n0:1498_0: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n0:1499_1: idha bhante bhikkhū adhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n0:1499_6: te imehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi na apakassanti,
anya-e0905n0:1499_11: ettāvatā kho bhante saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n0:1500_0: Pucchā – samaggaṃ āvuso saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kiṃ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n0:1501_1: samaggaṃ kho bhante saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhitikaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavati,
anya-e0905n0:1502_0: Pucchā – bhinnaṃ kho āvuso saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvā kiṃ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n0:1503_1: bhinnaṃ kho bhante saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvā brahmaṃ puññaṃ pasavati,
anya-e0905n0:1504_0: Pucchā – saṅghabhedaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1507_1: āgantukānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1508_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1508_2: āgantukā bhante bhikkhū saupāhanāpi ārāmaṃ pavisiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1508_9: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi bhikkhave āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmi,
anya-e0905n0:1508_11: āgantukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā idāni ārāmaṃ pavisissāmīti upāhanā omuñcitvā nīcaṃ katvā papphoṭetvā gahetvā
anya-e0905n0:1508_12: chattaṃ apanāmetvā sīsaṃ vivaritvā sīse cīvaraṃ khandhe katvā sādhukaṃ ataramānena ārāmo pavisitabbo”
anya-e0905n0:1508_13: evamādinā bhante āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1509_1: āvāsikānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1510_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule āvāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1510_2: sambahulā bhante āvāsikā bhikkhū āgantuke bhikkhū disvā neva āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1511_0: “Āvāsikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1511_2: paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ pānīyena pucchitabbo” evamādinā bhante āvāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1512_1: gamikānaṃ āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1513_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule gamike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1513_2: sambahulā bhante gamikā bhikkhū dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ appaṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ vivaritvā senāsanaṃ anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1513_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “gamikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā dārubhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā
anya-e0905n0:1513_4: senāsanaṃ āpucchā pakkamitabbaṃ” evamādinā bhante ākārena bhagavatā gamikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1514_1: bhattagge āvuso anumodituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1515_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1516_1: bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhattaggavattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1517_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1517_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā bhattaggaṃ gacchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1517_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sace ārāme kālo ārocito hoti,
anya-e0905n0:1517_4: timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā saguṇaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā
anya-e0905n0:1517_5: gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā dhovitvā pattaṃ gahetvā sādhukaṃ ataramānena gāmo pavisitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0905n0:1518_1: bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso senāsanavattaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1519_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1519_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūsu ajjhokāse cīvaraṃ karontesu paṭivāte aṅgaṇe senāsanaṃ papphoṭesuṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1519_5: sace ussahati sodhetabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanavattaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ.
anya-e0905n0:1520_0: Pucchā – samācāraṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1521_0: Vissajjanā – samācāraṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1523_1: sāpattikena āvuso pātimokkhaṃ suṇantassa pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapetuṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1524_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ puggalaṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1524_2: aññataro bhante puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo tadahuposathe saṅghamajjhe nisinno ahosi,
anya-e0905n0:1525_0: Pucchā – ṭhapanaṃ āvuso pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1526_0: Vissajjanā – ṭhapanaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n0:1528_1: aṭṭhahi āvuso garudhammehi upasampadā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n0:1529_2: mahāpajāpati bhante gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0905n0:1529_3: atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā bhagavantaṃ catukkhattuṃ yāci
anya-e0905n0:1529_4: mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye āgārasmā anāgāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1530_1: bhikkhūhi āvuso bhikkhuniyo upasampādetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1531_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1531_2: mahāpajāpati bhante gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathāhaṃ bhante imāsu sākiyānīsu paṭipajjāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n0:1532_1: ekato upasampannāya āvuso bhikkhunisaṅghe visuddhāya bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1533_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0905n0:1533_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṃ antarāyike dhamme pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0905n0:1538_0: Pucchā – pañcasatikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1542_0: Pucchā – sattasatikaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n0:1545_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:1547_0: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
